sources.title: Undertow (1949)
sources.description: Undertow stars Scott Brady as a gambler just out of wartime military service. No longer interested in wagers and speculations, Brady wants only to open up a mountain vacation lodge. Before this can take place, Brady is framed for murder, and forced to hide out in the home of Peggy Dow. With the help of Dow and a policeman friend, Brady searches for the real murderer. Watch carefully in Undertow and you'll spot new Universal contractee "Roc" Hudson as a plainclothes detective. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/undertow-1949/

sources.title: Undertow (1949) Scott Brady, John Russell, Dorothy Hart - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: Undertow is a 1949 American film noir crime film directed by William Castle and starring Scott Brady, John Russell, Dorothy Hart and Peggy Dow. The movie marks the second film to feature a young actor named Rock Hudson and the first in which he received a film credit for his work.   Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Undertow_(1949_film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: After being released from prison, an ex-convict is framed for a murder. The man sets out to find the real killers before the police blame the crime on him.
metadata.Actors: Scott Brady, John Russell, Dorothy Hart
